definition: to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation
suspense in a movie, play etc/concern for sb's welfare
pending a decision/hanging in the balance
to hang in the air/suspended in midair/(fig.) uncertain
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
mouth like a torrent (idiom)/eloquent/glib/voluble/have the gift of the gab

sentences.english: Thin film the scroll, clear bright light suspension.
sentences.chinese: 疏影臨書卷，清光皓月懸。

sentences.english: Moreover, the curve can represent hyperbolas and catenary exactly.
sentences.chinese: 此外，它可以精確表示雙曲線和懸鏈線。

sentences.english: The moon still hangs low in the sky, casting dim yellow light.
sentences.chinese: 那半個月亮仍懸在半空，發出昏黃的光。

sentences.english: Out of the southwest of Taiyuan fifty years, there is a mountain hanging urn.
sentences.chinese: 出太原西南行五十里，有一座山名懸甕。

sentences.english: A 25-watt lamp was suspended from the ceiling, functioning to luminate us every night.
sentences.chinese: 頂上懸一個25瓦的白熾燈泡，在夜晚給予光明。

sentences.english: Suspended Peak, five stamping on the Dougong, Liangjia Basilica structure and a slightly different approach.
sentences.chinese: 懸山頂，五踩斗拱，樑架結構與大殿做法略有不同。

sentences.english: The global economy is like a train hanging over a cliff.
sentences.chinese: 世界經濟就恰如半身懸於峭壁外的火車。

sentences.english: I'm holdin' on your rope, got me ten feet off the ground…
sentences.chinese: 我懸在你的繩子上，離地十英尺。

sentences.english: The moon was low in the sky.
Keep your shoulders down, and contract your gluteal muscles to push your hips up in the air.
sentences.chinese: 肩部向下，臀肌收縮，將臀部擡起懸於空中。

sentences.english: The end of the year, Jet Li's heart is still hanging.
sentences.chinese: 進入歲末，李連杰的心仍懸着。

sentences.english: They have a short, dark mane, a dewlap hanging from the throat, and long horns twisted in a tight spiral.
sentences.chinese: 有黑色短鬃毛，喉部有下懸的肉垂，長角盤扭成螺旋。

sentences.english: Our toil, resources, and livelihood are all involved.
sentences.chinese: 我們的辛勞，資源和生計全部生計都命懸於此。

sentences.english: Nor what soft incense hangs upon the boughs.
The tiled roof was of sea-green porcelain, and the jutting eaves were festooned with little bells.
sentences.chinese: 屋頂以海青色的瓷瓦鋪就，飛檐上則懸着小小的鈴鐺。

definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
